text: Just as a note, I have also done the above without JS, just pure CSS and HTML from the HubSpot menu. You can use HTML in the HubSpot Advanced Menu editor- add images, spans, etc- and then style those appropriately in your stylesheet.
yeah, is posible, but very hard to make in a custom module for everyone

Totally doable without JS too as <@UBFA10FMF> pointed out, but it would require you to add add tags and such into the menu editor. When doing it this way, I've found that unless you are the sole person making those updates all the time (or if the others are well versed in html to do this as well) you can run into issues easily.
we did something like that on a site some years ago, but is all in a HTML module, and if the client need to add/delete something we have to do it here (only had happen one time)
